item.title: Is Silicon Valley Losing Its Influence on DC?
item.description: This episode of Uncanny Valley covers black holes, woke AI, and the relationship between Silicon Valley billionaires and the Trump Administration.

item.title: The Best Smart Rings, Tested and Reviewed (2025)
item.description: A svelte smart ring can track important health metrics and doesn’t need to be charged every day.

item.title: What Is MicroSD Express? Everything You Need to Know
item.description: What is the latest MicroSD iteration, and why does your Nintendo Switch need it?

item.title: Nothing Headphone (1) Review: Something Special
item.description: These noise-canceling headphones are very nearly as good as AirPods Max, and they cost $150 less.

item.title: Programmers Aren’t So Humble Anymore—Maybe Because Nobody Codes in Perl
item.description: Perl is a messy, maddening programming language, the “duct tape of the internet.” But at least you can tell it was made by humans.
